dmca.title: Notification of Claimed Copyright Infringement. to Andrea Z. Almeida
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: info.07@awddesign.co.uk [mailto:info.07@awddesign.co.uk] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 20, 2007 8:26 PM
To: Copyright; info.07@awddesign.co.uk; awd.ceo@awddesign.co.uk;
awddesign@gmail.com
Subject: Notification of Claimed Copyright Infringement. to Andrea Z.
Almeida

Awddesign
4 Sherringham Ct
Sherringham Ave
Feltham Middx 
TW13 7JU
Great Britain
Ph: +44 (0) 20 8707 5660
Mob: +44 (0) 794 637 9033
www.Awddesign.co.uk


Wednesday, 21 February 2007

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc 
Andrea Z. Almeida
1333 Stemmons Freeway, 
Suite 110, 
Dallas, 
TX 75207
copyright@theplanet.com
REF Number: AWD-FDL
Report Date/Time: 21/02/07 02:07:05
Sent Via: email
File Types: pdf, txt
Dear ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc Andrea Z. Almeida
Notification of Claimed Copyright Infringement.
Name of the intellectual property owner: 
Awddesign.co.uk Albert Davis
This is a request to remove or disable access to all Awd design
copyrighted material found under the URL
http://www.flowersdeliveredlondon.com/

I have reserved all rights in the website, which was first published on
URL 
http://www.Flowerdeliverylondon.co.uk/

The infringing materials and their Internet location:
http://www.flowersdeliveredlondon.com/

The website was copied without permission from the copyrighted owners
website that is posted at http://www.Flowerdeliverylondon.co.uk/ which
clearly shows that the website had been copied verbatim and being
modified thereafter.

I did not authorize and was never contacted to see if the material could
be copied for use in any form.






4 Sherringham Ct
Sherringham Ave
Feltham Middx 
TW13 7JU
Great Britain
Ph: +44 (0) 20 8707 5660
Mob: +44 (0) 794 637 9033
www.Awddesign.co.uk


Wednesday, 21 February 2007

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc 
Andrea Z. Almeida
1333 Stemmons Freeway, 
Suite 110, 
Dallas, 
TX 75207
copyright@theplanet.com
REF Number: AWD-FDL
Report Date/Time: 21/02/07 02:07:05
Sent Via: email
File Types: pdf, txt

Therefore, pursuant to the DMCA, I hereby request that you expeditiously
remove or disable access to the infringing website
flowersdeliveredlondon.com

1. Cease and desist any and all actual or intended hosting of
client/server files and/or other copyrighted material (collectively, the
Content);
2. Disable all websites hosting or disseminating the Content; and
3. Provide verification of the above to us


I have a good faith belief that the use of the copyrighted material
above is not authorized by the copyright owner under law. I swear, under
penalty of perjury, that the information in this takedown notice is
accurate to the best of my knowledge, and that I am the copyright owner
of the work described above.

Please note that my contact information is private, and must not be used
for any purpose other than dealing with this notice. 

I appreciate your prompt attention to this matter. If you have any
questions about
this notice, please do not hesitate to contact me.


Sincerely,

Albert Davis
Awddesign.co.uk




Copyright work(s) identified in the notification of claimed
infringement.

Information to identify the copyrighted works:

http://www.flowerdeliverylondon.co.uk/

Flower Delivery London UK
Florist shop directory specialising in flower deliveries in London Uk.

The top florist directory, which enables you to order directly with your
favourite flower shop, for delivery in the London and Greater London
area. Flower delivery London Uk is a directory which includes only the
best flower shops in London Uk, for the best flower arrangements for
every occasion or event. Our member florist shops are of the highest
standards, with the a large flower selection and even larger flower
designs.
Order fresh flowers online today

through Flower Delivery London for your special fresh flowers, from the
local florist shop of your choise.

Flower delivery London has been created to give easy access to anybody,
anywhere in the world, to get through to a local florist shop without
unessessary clicking through endless irrelevant pages. With flower
delivery London you can view the local florist shop of your choise,
order your flower delivery in minutes, knowing that you buy your flowers
or gifts at the cheapest price possible. Why? because our member florist
and flower shops do not pay commission on any of your orders, so they
can give you the best price possible.
Fresh Flower Delivery

Whatever the occasion, event, party, anniversary, wedding, funeral,
sympathy. Just when you want to say I love you, I am sorry, happy
birthday, Valentines, mothers day, good bye, best wishes or
congratulations, there is only one florist and florist shop directory
for London Uk. A flower shop directory for your online orders, for your
fresh flowers delivery any Day, Week or Month of the Year.
A non commission flower florist shop directory

for member florists only, to guarantee cheapest prices, best quality
flowers for delivery in London UK.

Themed Events Flowers Flowers For Functions Flowers For Occasions
CorporateServices Contract Flowers Bridal Flowers Wedding Flowers
Romance Flowers Funeral - Sympathy Flowers Flowers for Her - Him
Anniversary Flowers Baby Flowers Thank you Flowers Sorry Flowers Season
Flowers Christmas Flower Decorations Valentine Flowers Easter Flowers
Mothers Day Flowers Birthday Flowers Congratulations Flowers Tropical
Flowers Roses Lilies

s/style.css



The infringing materials and their Internet location:

the best flower shops in London UK, for the best flower arrangements for
every occasion or event. These London florist shops are of the highest
standards, with the a large flower selection and even larger flower
designs.
Order fresh flowers online today

through Flowers Delivered London for your special fresh flowers, from
the local florist shop of your choice.

Flowers delivered London FDL has been created to give easy access to
anybody, anywhere in the world, to get through to a local London florist
shop without unessessary clicking through endless irrelevant pages. With
Flowers Delivered London you can view the local London florist shop of

Fresh Flowers Delivery in London

Whatever the occasion, event, party, anniversary, wedding, funeral,

birthday, Valentines, mothers day, good bye, best wishes or
